subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller, working back from a knee injury, skied an electrifying run that showcased the risky and brilliant skiing that is his trademark to overshadow Patrick Küng’s victory.
snippet: Bode Miller, working back from a knee injury, skied an electrifying run that showcased the risky and brilliant skiing that is his trademark to overshadow Patrick Küng’s victory.
